rows.label: qst200819_msg0001
rows.name:
Chepaan-san, working too hard
is bad for your health.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0002
rows.name:
No, but... this is
important research...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0003
rows.name:
Hey, rather than that, won't you
listen to what I have to say?

rows.label: qst200819_msg0004
rows.name:
...Ah, you're right. I suppose
I can listen for a bit.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0005
rows.name:
Then I'll take you up
on that. Actually...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0006
rows.name:
I see, you want to help
the Saffronia tree.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0007
rows.name:
I can't provide a splint,
but I can help with the
fungicide and antidesiccant.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0008
rows.name: Yes! As expected of Chepaan-san!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0009
rows.name: Hold on a moment.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0010
rows.name:
I'd love to grant Hotaru-chan's
wish, but I'm out of the
essential medicine right now.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0011
rows.name: Eh? What, you don't have it...?

rows.label: qst200819_msg0012
rows.name: No, no, Hotaru-chan, don't be so sad!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0013
rows.name:
If you bring me the
ingredients, I can make
as much medicine as you need!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0014
rows.name: That's fine, right?

rows.label: qst200819_msg0015
rows.name:
...Hmm, well, okay!
Thank you, Chepaan-san!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0016
rows.name: For Hotaru-chan, it's a piece of cake!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0017
rows.name: So, what should I gather?

rows.label: qst200819_msg0018
rows.name: First, for the fungicide ingredients...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0019
rows.name:
Five Olstepriniums and
five Frozen Sapphires.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0020
rows.name:
And for the antidesiccant
ingredients...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0021
rows.name:
Three Amber Leaves and
ten Ghost Dudleyas.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0022
rows.name:
Got it, thank you. I'll go
gather the ingredients, so
please take care of it!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0023
rows.name: Yeah, be careful!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0024
rows.name:
Chepaan-san is such a
simple and nice person!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0025
rows.name: Now, let's go find the ingredients!
